casebody.data:
TOWN OF NAGS HEAD
v.
RICHARDSON, et al. 244A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 29, 2018 Norman W. Shearin, David P. Ferrell, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Richardson, William W., et al. M.H. Hood Ellis, Benjamin Marshall Gallop, Attorneys at Law, Elizabeth City, for Town of Nags Head.

*396The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of October 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of October 2018."
